fact.text: California has more people than all of Canada.
Australia is wider than the moon.
Vatican City is the smallest country in the world.
90% of Earth's population lives in the Northern Hemisphere.
Continents shift at about the same rate as your fingernails grow.
Africa is the only continent that covers all four hemispheres.
Canada has more than half of all natural lakes in the world.
China shares its boarder with 14 countries.
Of the 25 highest peaks of the world 19 are in the Himalayas.
The shorsest name of a place is Ã… .
Nauru is the only nation that has no official capital.
